label: df['Noise']
peekOfCode:
df['Noise'] = np.random.normal(0, 2, size=len(df))
# Plot noise
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 5))
plt.plot(df['Date'], df['Noise'], label='Noise')
plt.title("Irregular Component (Noise)")
plt.xlabel("Date")
plt.ylabel("Value")
plt.legend()
plt.show()
